com.group17.game.model.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group17.game.model.GameObject
      • com.group17.game.model.entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends GameObject
    Models the player in the game. Handles the players inventory.
    Author:
    Laurence Rawlings, Hadi Jalali
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
